title: Application of sections 354B to 354O.
content: 354A.- (1) Sections 354B to 354I shall apply to all overseas companies, incorporated or registered pursuant to the laws of an approved country or jurisdiction, according to the laws of which these companies can still exist as legal entities under the legal regime of another approved country or jurisdiction. (2)Sections 354J to 354O shall apply to all companies incorporated under this Law and wish to continue to exist as legal entities, under the legal regime or jurisdiction of a country other than the Republic. Suitability for registration as a company continuing in the Republic. 2 of 124(I) of 2006.
